column4: i have dual OS installed, I want my michine start straight from the Windows partion, how can i do that?
clarify. Youmean you want to 'boot' straight to windows by default from the grub menu?
the 'startupmanager' program gives you a gui to select the default grub item. Or theres other ways to select the default
check out the grub2 docs/factoids/wiki page and forum posts i recall seeing it covered there.. but i just use the gui tool
